          <title>
            <string language="en">Sugar dissolution and water evaporation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuckerauflösung und Wasserverdampfung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dissolution de sucre et évaporation de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dissolução do açúcar e evaporação da água</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Disolución del azúcar y evaporación del agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the dissolution of sugar in water and evaporation of water in the solution.</string>
          </description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la dissolution du sucre
